模块 com.example.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.sprite.character

类 Boss

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.GameObject
com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.sprite.SpriteObject
com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.sprite.character.Boss
public class Boss extends SpriteObject
Boss is also non-controllable, and only after four shoots would boss be bubbled. If boss is not killed during the bubbled period, it would free from it and gain another 4 lives.

    • Boss

      public Boss​(GameScene gameScene, int colNum, int rowNum)
      Instantiates a new Boss.
      参数:
      gameScene - the gameScene that boss in
      colNum - the column that boss would be placed
      rowNum - the row that boss would be placed
